column4: dist-upgrade can pull in new packages, which upgrade will not
I know that but the stable release doesn't have major upgrades requiring a dist-upgrade otherwise apt-get upgrade is irrelevent and would be depreciated and removed.
eg., a new version of mplayer could be 'held back' in an upgrade, because it now depends on a new lib package; dist-upgrade would install the new package and upgrade mplayer
no, but people use other repos for such as mplayer
it can't be, because of US legal b0rkage AFAIK
of course folks in here will help people with Univer/Multiverse software if they can. That's jsut a great community
